content.raw:
[#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/ Adding Thrusters For Competition](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/%20Adding%20Thrusters%20For%20Competition)

Here is the link to the tutorial. It is very similar to the sensor configuration tutorial that Marshall made. The key differences are:

* `engine.xacro` is currently the only thruster type, while there are many sensor types
* I’m not sure how Marshall added the images without being able to push images to master
content.html:
#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/ Adding Thrusters For Competition

Here is the link to the tutorial. It is very similar to the sensor configuration tutorial that Marshall made. The key differences are:

  • engine.xacro is currently the only thruster type, while there are many sensor types
  • I’m not sure how Marshall added the images without being able to push images to master
